snippet: New year, new Academy Awards poster, but the celebrity-industrial complex chugs on.
abstract: New year, new Academy Awards poster, but the celebrity-industrial complex chugs on.
lead_paragraph: The Bagger may have taken last week off, but the celebrity-industrial complex never rests. Meryl Streep earned kudos from the Kennedy Center and will receive an honorary Golden Bear from the Berlin Film Festival next month. The Palm Springs International Film Festival also announced yet more honorees - Charlize Theron, Jessica Chastain and Howard Shore join most of the season's other lauded performers. And the Academy signaled once again that it is not trying to shake things up this year.

headline.main: We're Baa-ack, and the Academy Is, Too
